name: The Collector (Polraudio)
description:
The Collector is a game that is about collecting objects in a given amount of time in order to pass the level. Each level tells a little story about what is going on.

This game is still in its early stages of development but is still fun to play. I will be constantly updating this game as I work on it. I don't have a defined schedule for release as I have random hours every week for my job.

Planned Features:

  • More levels.
  • Crafting system for making skins out of collected objects.
  • Boss levels at the end of each area.
  • Save system(when I get farther in development).
  • Player "hub" where you can see achievements you have gained and a crafting spot.
  • Minigames.
  • Many more popping in my head as the days go by.

Back Burner Features(May make it into the game or not):

  • Building/Decorating system for the player "hub".
  • Ability to have custom songs for the radio.
  • Custom skins for the player.

Back Back Burner:

  • Level editor.

Known Bugs:

  • Radio goes poof if you pick to retry a level but will come back when you exit the level.
  • Teleporter going to the player "hub" doesn't have popup text.
  • Cannot press E to start a level.

Credits:

Lucas Dolan - Designer

Eric Matyas - Music(soundimage.org)

Shane Moss - Intro Voice

If this game was fun please let me know and id love to see what scores you get for each level.
